topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f819c86368723169160100#post_53f819c86368723169160100
When you spend like 2 paragraphs describing the appearance of someone or something, you have less actually happen in the story. It's a weird balance thing. You have to give SOME detail just not so much that it becomes a slog to get through.
But yeah you got some sick potential there.
